00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  The basic context (Parser::Context is a subclass of this)
00004 #
00005 
00006 package Value::Context;
00007 my $pkg = "Value::Context";
00008 use strict; no strict "refs";
00009 use UNIVERSAL;
00010 
00011 #
00012 #  Create a new Context object and initialize its data lists
00013 #
00014 sub new {
00015   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00016   my $context = bless {
00017     pattern => {
00018       number => '(?:\d+(?:\.\d*)?|\.\d+)(?:E[-+]?\d+)?',
00019       signedNumber => '[-+]?(?:\d+(?:\.\d*)?|\.\d+)(?:E[-+]?\d+)?',
00020     },
00021     format => {
00022       number => '%g',  # default format for Reals
00023     },
00024     error => {
00025       string => '',
00026       pos => undef,
00027       message => '',
00028       flag => 0,
00029       msg => {},  # for localization
00030     },
00031     data => {
00032       hashes => ['cmpDefaults'],
00033       arrays => ['data'],
00034       values => ['pattern','format','value'],
00035       objects => [],
00036     },
00037     value => {
00038       Formula => "Value::Formula"
00039     },
00040   }, $class;
00041   my %data = (lists=>{},flags=>{},diagnostics=>{},@_);
00042   $context->{_lists} = new Value::Context::Lists($context,%{$data{lists}});
00043   $context->{_flags} = new Value::Context::Flags($context,%{$data{flags}});
00044   $context->{_diagnostics} = new Value::Context::Diagnostics($context,%{$data{diagnostics}});
00045   $context->{_initialized} = 1;
00046   $context->update;
00047   return $context;
00048 }
00049 
00050 #
00051 #  Implemented in subclasses
00052 #
00053 sub update {}
00054 
00055 #
00056 #  Access to the data lists
00057 #
00058 sub lists         {(shift)->{_lists}}
00059 sub flags         {(shift)->{_flags}}
00060 sub flag          {(shift)->{_flags}->get(shift)}
00061 sub diagnostics   {(shift)->{_diagnostics}}
00062 
00063 #
00064 #  Make a copy of a Context object
00065 #
00066 sub copy {
00067   my $self = shift;
00068   my $context = $self->new();
00069   $context->{_initialized} = 0;
00070   foreach my $data (@{$context->{data}{objects}}) {
00071     $context->{$data}->copy($self->{$data});
00072   }
00073   foreach my $data (@{$context->{data}{hashes}}) {
00074     $context->{$data} = {};
00075     foreach my $x (keys %{$self->{$data}}) {
00076       $context->{$data}{$x} = {%{$self->{$data}{$x}}};
00077     }
00078   }
00079   foreach my $data (@{$context->{data}{arrays}}) {
00080     $context->{$data} = {};
00081     foreach my $x (keys %{$self->{$data}}) {
00082       $context->{$data}{$x} = [@{$self->{$data}{$x}}];
00083     }
00084   }
00085   foreach my $data (@{$context->{data}{values}}) {
00086     $context->{$data} = {%{$self->{$data}}};
00087   }
00088   $context->{error}{msg} = {%{$self->{error}{msg}}};
00089   $context->{error}{convert} = $self->{error}{convert}
00090     if defined $self->{error}{convert};
00091   $context->{name} = $self->{name};
00092   $context->{_initialized} = 1;
00093   return $context;
00094 }
00095 
00096 #
00097 #  Returns the package name for the specificied Value object class
00098 #  (as specified by the context's {value} hash, or "Value::name").
00099 #
00100 sub Package {
00101   my $context = shift; my $class = shift;
00102   return $context->{value}{$class} if defined $context->{value}{$class};
00103   $class =~ s/\(\)$//;
00104   return $context->{value}{$class} if defined $context->{value}{$class};
00105   return "Value::$class" if defined @{"Value::${class}::ISA"};
00106   Value::Error("No such package 'Value::%s'",$class) unless $_[0];
00107 }
00108 
00109 #
00110 #  Make these available to Contexts
00111 #
00112 sub isa {UNIVERSAL::isa(@_)}
00113 sub can {UNIVERSAL::can(@_)}
00114 
00115 #
00116 #  Make stringify produce TeX or regular strings
00117 #
00118 sub texStrings {shift->flags->set(StringifyAsTeX=>1)}
00119 sub normalStrings {shift->flags->set(StringifyAsTeX=>0)}
00120 
00121 #
00122 #  Clear error flags
00123 #
00124 sub clearError {
00125   my $error = (shift)->{error};
00126   $error->{string} = '';
00127   $error->{pos} = undef;
00128   $error->{message} = '';
00129   $error->{original} = '';
00130   $error->{flag} = 0;
00131 }
00132 
00133 #
00134 #  Set the error flags
00135 #
00136 sub setError {
00137   my $error = (shift)->{error};
00138   my ($message,$string,$pos,$more,$flag) = @_;
00139   my @args = ();
00140   ($message,@args) = @{$message} if ref($message) eq 'ARRAY';
00141   $error->{original} = $message;
00142   while ($message && $error->{msg}{$message}) {$message = $error->{msg}{$message}}
00143   while ($more && $error->{msg}{$more}) {$more = $error->{msg}{$more}}
00144   $message = sprintf($message,@args) if scalar(@args) > 0;
00145   while ($message && $error->{msg}{$message}) {$message = $error->{msg}{$message}}
00146   $message .= sprintf($more,$pos->[0]+1) if $more;
00147   $message = &{$error->{convert}}($message) if defined $error->{convert};
00148   $error->{message} = $message;
00149   $error->{string} = $string;
00150   $error->{pos} = $pos;
00151   $error->{flag} = $flag || 1;
00152 }

00155 #
00156 #  Load the subclasses.
00157 #
00158 
00159 END {
00160   use Value::Context::Data;
00161 }
